attributes.action: Stop Osborne's Work for the Dole scheme
attributes.additional_details: Forcing those unlucky enough to be outside full-time or part-time employment leading to PAYE to work between 30-40 hours a week simply to obtain benefits which will enable them to survive whilst seeking employment is perverse and unworkable. it will result in a culture of companies using an endless supply of modern-day slaves instead of employing people to do jobs which evidently need to be done.This must be debated in Parliament.

rejection.details: This is not a Government Policy it is a Party Political announcment
